channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Graffiti on cyclists dismount signs, 20th December
item.description:
The signs at both sides of the hempden street footbridge (behind the naim dangoor academy) urging cyclists to dismount are covered with graffiti and are not visible. Also the signs themselves are very small. Therefore they are blatantly ignored causing health and safety issues on the footbridge.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Westway, Bayswater, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hazardous hole round drain cover, 20th December
item.description:
This fault is a hazard to motorists, the extremely loud bang will have them wondering whether they have lost a wheel or part of their car and distract them from full attention to the other road users. The undersides of the drain fitment are now open to fresh air as the rubble gets pounded away and the depth of the hole could bring a cyclist off their bike. Immediate attention is required before a cyclist gets flattened by a bus behind. I am providing this duplicate report so the council can see the growing size of the hole and act before an accident occurs, as I can't add it to the original report.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 99-101, High Street, Goddington, Orpington, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Granville Road NW6 5AR, 20th December
item.description:
Fly Tip down the bottom of Granville Road , Shopping Trolley FULL of RUBBISH and RUBBISH BAGS and ALL SORTS of GARBAGE NEEDS CLEARING. It has been there for WEEKS. NO ONE IS BOTHERING to Report it or Remove it. This is GERMS, and a HEALTH HAZARD, SQUATTERS are seen and People are DUMPING HERE. Attracts RATS and FOXES. Itâ€™s DISGUSTING and DIRTY. REMOVAL of Shopping Trolley and The FLY TIP ASAP

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Granville Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
